name: UTILITY HELICOPTERS PTY. LTD.
about: Utility Helicopters Pty. Ltd., based in Archerfield, Brisbane, is a premier flight training institution dedicated to excellence and safety. With top-notch facilities, our school provides a nurturing environment that maximizes students' chances of landing a job after completing their Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our team of highly skilled, grade 1 instructors offers hands-on, real-world training, preparing students for careers in multi-crew operations, search and rescue, aerial work, and more. We are committed to your success, connecting you with job opportunities through our extensive network. At Utility Helicopters, we empower you to become industry leaders in aviation with a safe and successful career.
services:
["Trial Introductory Flight
Private Pilot License (Helicopter)
Commercial Pilot License (Helicopter)
Helicopter Pilot Ratings & Endorsements"]
